name: Afternoon.co
headline: AI Bookkeeping and tax platform for ecommerce & startup founders
description:
Afternoon.co empowers founders to make better business decisions with real time financial metrics. We pair managed AI bookkeeping and tax services, to reduce administrative burden on founders. 

Accountants struggle serving 4 million+ of ecommerce brands & startups in the US, because of complexity in sales tax, multiple sales channels and inventory management. We automate a large portion of bookkeeping by integrating with their sales and inventory systems, so founders can spend less time doing admin work.

founders.name: Roman Zubenko, Founder
founders.description: Roman is the CEO of Afternoon.co. Previously he was a Growth PM at Notion, and PM & engineer at Gusto. At Gusto he led the launch of personal finance products, and was an engineer for accounting products.

founders.name: Benjamin Paik, Founder
founders.description: Ben is a co-founder of Afternoon.co. Previously, he was at Brex, where he launched an FP&A product line. Prior to that, he spent eight years at Gusto, where he introduced an embedded payroll product, launched international payroll capabilities, and led the payments team managing billions of dollars.

raw_markdown="[![Hedron Logo](https://afternoon.co/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fnew_logo_2.png&w=64&q=75)Afternoon](https://afternoon.co/</>)Toggle menu
[Pricing](https://afternoon.co/</pricing>)[About](https://afternoon.co/</about-us>)[Login](https://afternoon.co/</login>)[Get early access](https://afternoon.co/<https:/cal.com/team/afternoon.co/demo>)
Backed by ![Hedron Logo](https://afternoon.co/yc.png)Combinator
Bookkeeping and tax platform for ecommerce & startup founders
Focus on growing your business, while Afternoon takes care of your bookkeeping, income and sales taxes. Purpose built for tech startups and e-commerce brands.
[Get early access](https://afternoon.co/<https:/cal.com/team/afternoon.co/demo>)
![Hero Image](https://afternoon.co/images/screenshot_4.png)
## Save time and avoid penalties
### Bookkeeping
If you don't have a bookkeeper or accountant, we can help you keep your books clean and up to date.
Bookkeeping services
Monthly financial statements
Expense tracking
Invoicing and payments
### Year end and quarterly taxes
If you don't work with CPA we can help you file your year end and quarterly taxes.
Year-end tax filing
Quarterly estimated tax calculations
Tax deduction optimization
Audit support
### Sales tax automation
Calculate, file, and remit sales tax in all US states automatically.
Nexus monitoring
Support for all 50 US States
Annual, quarterly or monthly filings
Audit support
### Government compliance + mail
Automate goverment communication and filings.
Compliance calendar with all key dates
LLC Renewals
Annual reports with states
No more missed snail mail
## Effortless sales tax compliance
Afternoon makes it easy to monitor exposure, register, and file sales tax in all US states.
### Monitor exposure
Connect your billing and HR system to monitor your exposure in real-time.
![Hedron Logo](https://afternoon.co/maryland_registration.png)
### Nexus study
Our tax experts will determine which states you have a tax obligation in, and which states you need to register in.
![Hedron Logo](https://afternoon.co/states-map2.png)
### Register
Register in any US state with a single click. Afternoon will registrer you in all states where you have a tax obligation.
![Hedron Logo](https://afternoon.co/ohio_registration.png)
### File and remit sales tax automatically
We will file and remit sales taxes in all states automatically on your behalf.
![Hero Image](https://afternoon.co/_next/image?url=%2Fstate-reg.png&w=828&q=75)
## FAQs
### What is Afternoon?
### What kind of companies do you serve?
### Do you handle bookkeeping?
### Do you handle my business income taxes?
### Why should I care about sales tax?
### Which states do I need to register to collect sales tax in? 
### Will you help me with registrations? 
Ready to get started?
Focus on growing your business, while Afternoon takes care of your bookkeeping, income and sales taxes.
[Get early access](https://afternoon.co/<https:/cal.com/team/afternoon.co/demo>)
![Hedron Logo](https://afternoon.co/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fnew_logo_2.png&w=64&q=75)Afternoon

  * [Twitter](https://afternoon.co/<https:/x.com/afternoonHQ>)
  * [Privacy](https://afternoon.co/</privacy>)
  * [Terms](https://afternoon.co/</terms>)

generated_description:
**Afternoon.co: Making Bookkeeping Effortless for Founders**

Founded in 2024 and part of Y Combinator's Batch F24, **Afternoon.co** is on a mission to transform how ecommerce and startup founders handle their finances. Based in New York, this lean startup — currently a team of just two — provides an AI-powered bookkeeping and tax platform designed specifically for the unique needs of online business leaders.

### The Problem
Many founders face a daunting landscape of financial administration, often overwhelmed by complexities like sales tax, multiple sales channels, and inventory management. Traditional accountants struggle to keep up with the over four million ecommerce brands and startups in the U.S., leaving founders bogged down in tedious paperwork.

### The Solution
Afternoon.co cuts through this complexity with a focus on automation. By integrating seamlessly with sales and inventory systems, the platform allows founders to focus on growing their businesses instead of getting lost in administrative tasks.

Their offerings include:
- **Bookkeeping Services**: Monthly financial statements, expense tracking, and invoicing.
- **Tax Support**: Assistance with year-end and quarterly taxes, tax deduction optimization, and audit support.
- **Sales Tax Automation**: Automating the calculation, filing, and remittance of sales taxes across all 50 states.
- **Government Compliance**: Helping manage communication and filings, ensuring no deadlines are missed.

### Why It Matters
The combination of automated bookkeeping and tax services is designed to eliminate the burdensome aspects of financial management, so founders can spend their time where it truly counts — on their businesses. By monitoring tax exposure in real time and facilitating smooth sales tax compliance, Afternoon.co positions itself as an essential partner for tech startups and ecommerce brands.

### Join the Movement
Afternoon.co is actively welcoming early adopters ready to simplify their financial lives. With the backing of Y Combinator and a forward-thinking approach, this startup is buzzing with potential, poised to change how founders engage with their bookkeeping and tax processes.

For more information, you can visit their [website](https://afternoon.co) and explore the advantages of their automated solutions.

As with many great ideas, it’s about seeing a clear need and addressing it head-on — that's exactly what Afternoon.co is doing for ecommerce and startup founders. If you’re in that world, this could be the tool that lights up your financial path.
